text: Rolands Kalniņš (7 May 1922 – 17 May 2022) was a Latvian movie director, screenwriter and producer. He was born in Vecslabada, Latvia. His movies Stone and Rubble and Breathe Deeply were extremely controversial. Kalniņš turned 100 on 7 May 2022. He died ten days later on 17 May. ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Latvian writers Category:Movie directors Category:Movie producers Category:Screenwriters Category:Centenarians
title: Rolands Kalniņš
